subject: junit, jpcoverage, and ant
msgSnippet: Hi, I m trying to get some code coverage for my junit tests. I m using JProbe Coverage from Sitraka software to get the code coverage information. JPCoverage
messageBody:
Hi,
I'm trying to get some code coverage for my junit tests. I'm using
JProbe Coverage from Sitraka software to get the code coverage
information.
JPCoverage calls ant which in turn runs my unit tests. I've been
careful to set "fork="no" in my junit ant task so that my tests run
in the same jvm as ant.
Despite this, and despite the fact that it's clear my tests are
executing, jpcoverage is still reporting 0% coverage of my code.
Does anybody have any experience with this? I'm wondering what I
could be doing wrong.
I realize that there's also a jpcoverage ant task which would then
run JProbe inside my ant project (rather than vice versa); would this
be a superior approach? I suspect I would have the same problem.

Thanks,
MT
